    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuclear fusion reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernfusionreaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de fusion nucléaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação da fusão nuclear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di fusione nucleare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση πυρηνικής τήξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción de la fusión nuclear</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates nuclear fusion of: two protons producing a deuterium nucleus, a positron, and a neutrino (a), a proton and a deuterium nucleus forming a helium-3 nucleus (b), two helium-3 nuclei producing a helium-4 nucleus and two protons.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deuterium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutrinos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Protons</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht Kernfusion von: 
zwei Protone, einen Deuteriumkern produzierend, ein Positron und
ein Neutrino (a), ein Proton und ein Deuteriumkern, die einen helium-3
Kern (b) bilden, zwei Kerne helium-3, einen Kern helium-4 und zwei 
Protone produzierend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la fusion nucléaire de : 
deux protons produisant un noyau de deutérium, un positron, et 
un neutrino (a), un proton et un noyau de deutérium formant helium-3 
un noyau (b), deux noyaux helium-3 produisant un noyau helium-4 et 
deux protons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a fusão nuclear de: 
dois protons produzindo um núcleo do deuterium, um positron, e 
um neutrino (a), um proton e um núcleo do deuterium que dão forma 
helium-3 a um núcleo (b), dois núcleos helium-3 produzindo um 
núcleo helium-4 e dois protons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la fusione nucleare di: 
due protoni producendo un nucleo del deuterio, un positron e un 
neutrino (a), un protone e un nucleo del deuterio che formano helium-3
un nucleo (b), due nuclei helium-3 producendo un nucleo helium-4 e due
protoni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την πυρηνική τήξη: 
δύο πρωτόνια που παράγουν έναν πυρήνα δευτέριου, ένα 
ποζιτρόνιο, και ένα neutrino (α), ένα πρωτόνιο και έναν 
πυρήνα δευτέριου που διαμορφώνουν έναν ήλιο-3 πυρήνα (β), δύο 
ήλιο-3 πυρήνες που παράγει ήλιο-4 πυρήνα και δύο πρωτόνια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la fusión nuclear de: 
dos protones produciendo un núcleo del deuterio, un positrón, 
y un neutrino (a), un protón y un núcleo del deuterio que forman 
helium-3 un núcleo (b), dos núcleos helium-3 produciendo un núcleo 
helium-4 y dos protones.</string>
          </description>
